hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash echo "giteePullRequestIid: ${giteePullRequestIid}" echo "giteeAfterCommitSha: ${giteeAfterCommitSha}" echo "giteeRef: ${giteeRef}" git config --global core.compression 0 #git config --global user.name "opengauss-bot" #git config --global credential.helper "store"
a=0 flag=0 while [ $a -lt 10 ] do echo $a rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss timeout 60 git clone -b ${giteeTargetBranch} "${openGaussServer_Http_Repo_Url}" "${WORKSPACE}/openGauss" if [[ $? == 0 ]] ; then flag=1 break fi a=`expr $a + 1` done
if [[ $flag == 0 ]] ; then echo "clone clone failed!" exit 1 fi # 2.4注释掉 #rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss
#if [ -d "${WORKSPACE}/openGauss" ] #then # cd ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss && git clean -dfx && git checkout -f master && git reset --hard origin/master #else # git clone "${openGaussServer_Ssh_Repo_Url}" "${WORKSPACE}/openGauss" #fi
cd ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree git config remote.origin.url ${openGaussServer_Http_Repo_Url} git fetch --tags --force --progress origin ${giteeRef}:${giteeRef} #git fetch --tags --force --progress ${openGaussServer_Ssh_Repo_Url} ${giteeRef} #git fetch --tags --force --progress ${openGaussServer_Ssh_Repo_Url} +refs/heads/master:refs/remotes/origin/master +refs/pull/*/MERGE:refs/pull/*/MERGE #git fetch --tags --force --progress ${openGaussServer_Ssh_Repo_Url} +refs/heads/master:refs/remotes/origin/master +refs/pull/${giteePullRequestIid}/MERGE:refs/pull/${giteePullRequestIid}/MERGE #git rev-parse refs/pull/${giteePullRequestIid}/MERGE^{commit} #git branch -a -v --no-abbrev --contains ${giteeAfterCommitSha} #git checkout -f ${giteeAfterCommitSha} git checkout -b ${giteeRef} ${giteeRef}
#mkdir -p ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss/binarylibs cd ${WORKSPACE} rm -rf openGauss-third_party_binarylibs* set +x if [ $giteeTargetBranch = "2.0.0" ] || [ $giteeTargetBranch = "2.0.1" ]; then echo "user 2.0.0 version 3rd binarylibs" wget -q -P ${WORKSPACE} ftp://mpp:openGauss1%232_3%24@192.168.0.155/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs-2.0.0.tar.gz -O ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz else echo "user latest 3rd binarylibs" wget -q -P ${WORKSPACE} ftp://mpp:openGauss1%232_3%24@192.168.0.155/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz -O ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz fi #wget -q -P ${WORKSPACE} ftp://mpp:openGauss1%232_3%24@192.168.0.155/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz -O ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz set -x #tar -zxf ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz -C ${WORKSPACE} #cp -rf ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs/* ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss/binarylibs #cp -rf ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party/* ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss/third_party
#wget https://opengauss.obs.cn-south-1.myhuaweicloud.com/1.1.0/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz
tar -zxf ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz
cd ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss/build/script
#auto:make_compile.log chmod +x build_opengauss.sh sed -i 's/make -sj 8/make -sj 6 /g' mpp_package.sh sed -i 's/make install -sj 8/make install -sj 6 /g' mpp_package.sh
sh ./build_opengauss.sh -pkg server -m release -pm opengauss -mc off -3rd ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs | tee compile_gaussdb.log set -x echo "#################################### Build log begin ####################################" cat makemppdb_pkg.log echo "#################################### Build log end ######################################" set +x
cat compile_gaussdb.log makemppdb_pkg.log | grep "installation complete"
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "[ERROR] make compile failed!" exit 1 else echo "[INFO] make compile end succeefully!" exit 0 fi
